value.title: Fields Parameter in Power BI | Filter Visual by Measures
value.excerpt: During this video I will demonstrate a technique to filter the visuals by measures. We will talk about a new feature - Fields Parameter in Power BI.  Field parameters will allow users to dynamically change the measures or dimensions being analyzed within a report. This feature can help your end-users
